testimonials.name: Oumaima Makhlouk
testimonials.quote: Unique, Rich & high quality content!! I have learned a lot of things, thank you for your efforts!

testimonials.name: Anas AIT BAHA
testimonials.quote: Geeks BlaBla is the best place where you can have an idea about whatever IT topic you want from experts, simplified enough!

testimonials.name: Afaf RIDAOUI
testimonials.quote: Personally, I find it so beneficial and the way of choosing topics and stuff is amazing. good job ‚ù§üëç.

testimonials.name: Othmane Kinane
testimonials.quote: One of the few darija speaking tech podcast. Always a pleasure to listen to, and was honored to be a guest in one of the episodes. I discovered some amazing people from around

testimonials.name: Badr Bellaj
testimonials.quote: Geeksblabla is an excellent live streaming program for developers. I had the pleasure to be a guest therein. Honestly, I liked the decontracted atmosphere and the ability to interact live with other developers, it was really cool, fun and constructive.

testimonials.name: Ahmed NFAIHI
testimonials.quote: Honestly, Geeksblabla is a great concept to share knowledge and experiences in Tech between developers. Organized and presented by a fabulous team where its members share the same passion.

testimonials.name: Mohamed ELBARCHANY
testimonials.quote: GeeksBlabla is one of the few Podcasts I'm addicted to. Love the variety of topics and guests. Thanks to this kind of initiatives, Moroccan dev community is more active than ever!

testimonials.name: Ilias Haddad
testimonials.quote: One of my favorite darija speaking tech podcast. Keep up the great work and thank you for your efforts!

testimonials.name: Arbaoui Mehdi
testimonials.quote: I enjoy listening to the podcasts, plus I love how you approach subjects in a natural and fun way. THANKS FOR LETTING US HEARING YOUR VOICE.
